tool_description: Identifies dangerous species that closely resemble identified edible plants or fungi, providing critical safety warnings to prevent misidentification.

warning_sensitivity.description: Warning sensitivity: low, medium, high, maximum

error_messages: Species not found: Identified species not in lookalike database
Invalid region: Region code not recognized for lookalike analysis
Critical lookalikes detected: STOP - dangerous species closely resemble your identification
usage: Provide identified_species and region_code to get lookalike warnings. Set warning_sensitivity to control alert threshold. Always review warnings before consuming any wild edibles.

warning_level.description: Overall warning level: low, moderate, high, critical
